column4: hi. I have a new external HD it's ntfs formatted. I run a dual boot machine, should I format it as FATS or NFTS? Any thouhgts? Under 8.04 I'm having more problems with my FATS partition than with my NTFS internal drive. Any thoughts?
use ntfs, ntfs is feature-packed than vfat
ntfs is newer than vfat, and getting better support w/ ubuntu
